data.text: @DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @diprogurugram1 Sir wearing mask is suffocating for all. Suffocating

@ajitchhokar @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 We would like to clarify that wearing masks at all points in time is compulsory for safety of all concerned. We thank you for reaching out to us. 

Please stay safe, wear a mask.
@DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 Is Mask compulsory while travelling in personal vehicle like cars?
@DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 Do you have any evidence Mask plays a key role in reducing probability of transmission ?
@DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 That's bro science, common cloth masks which people wear don't do anything

@DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 Thanks for sharing this 

Much needed for each citizen

@DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 Absolutely 

Many people Just keep it in their hand as a fashion statement ....

@DC_Gurugram @nishantyadavIAS @cdgurugram @diprogurugram1 महोदय आये दिन जर्जर दीवार से पत्थर गिरते हैं कई बार बडी हानि होने से बचे है ,लगभग 5 महीने पहले शिकायत दी थी ,महोदय आपसे विनती है संबंधित अधिकारी को अतिक्रमण हटाने का निर्देश दिया जाए।
